pullRequest.title: Mutation testing for dpc-common module
pullRequest.bodyText:
Why
Ongoing work to improve our test code coverage of DPC, this is a small PR that squashes some more mutations in the dpc-common module.
See #507 for more details on mutation testing.
What Changed
Updated test coverage for FHIRBuilders, FHIRExtractors various dropwizard features/filtesrs.
Choices Made
Tickets closed:
Future Work
More to squash
Checklist

 All tests are passing via make ci-app (app change) and make ci-web (website change)
 Swagger documentation has been updated
 FHIR documentation has been updated
 Any required dpc-ops changes have a PR submitted and mentioned in this ticket
 Any manual migration steps are documented, scripts written (where applicable), and tested
 Before merging, any required dpc-ops changes have been approved and merged into master of the dpc-ops repo

commit.message:
Kill mutations in FHIRExtractors

Updated the FHIRExtractors class and test coverage to be more thorough.
Updated the thrown exceptions to be more specific, rather than the generic WebApplicationException.
Renamed getMPI to getMBI, as it should have been all along.

Kill mutations in FHIRBuilders

Added some simple tests to the FHIRBuilders to kill all the things.

Remove potentially unused serializers

I don't think we need this anymore, so we can remove it.
FHIRRequestFeature is now mocked and unit tested.
Moved FHIRExtractors and removed unused imports.
Remove MethodOutcomeHandler.java because it's not actually needed.

nodes.bodyText: This comment is appreciated! I would have been very confused otherwise.
